name: Easy Category Cloud
author: Rajendra Mahajan

sections.description:
Easy Category Cloud is a light weight stable plugin that provides easy navigation based user interface to access Woocommerce category and sub categories; It is also singular in purpose and stable.
It comes with no configuration works with latest version of WordPress. This category cloud is completely responsive and works with all latest browsers.
If you liked my plugin, please rate it.
sections.installation:
1. Upload “easy-category-cloud” folder to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
  3. Place “[easycategorycloud]” shortcode to WordPress page/post.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload “easy-category-cloud” folder to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
  3. Place “[easycategorycloud]” shortcode to WordPress page/post.

Does it requires any configuration?

No.

Does it pulls sub categories as well?

Yes, it pulls all categories and sub categories from the Woocommerce.

What about support?

Create a support ticket at WordPress forum and I will take care of any issue.

short_description: Easy Category Cloud provides a category and sub categories cloud list for Woocommerce categories.
